gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Cavaliers 110, Grizzlies 98
gameRecap.excerpt: Cleveland defeats Memphis, 110-98. For Cleveland, Donovan Mitchell led the way with 29 points (five 3PM), four rebounds, eight assists, and three steals while aided by Jarrett Allen (16 points, 10 rebounds, five assists, three blocks) in the victory. Jake LaRavia finished with 32 points (career-high eight 3PM), seven rebounds, and two steals with GG Jackson recording 22 points and two steals for Memphis in the losing effort. Cleveland improves to 47-33, while Memphis moves to 27-53 with the loss.
